title: Letterhead, Topps Products Corp., late 20th century
medium: Letterpress: dark gray, red ink on white wove paper
markings: Watermark: Strathmore Bay Path Bond 50% Cotton Fiber U.S.A.
inscribed: Imprinted to right of logo, in black: "the world's largest watchband distributor" (in script); then imprinted below, in red, 930 Newark Avenue. Jersey City 6, New Jersey. Oldfield 6-1200.  Further imprinted below, in black: Telephone: New York.Rector 2-5851. Telegrams: Fax Jersey City.   Imprinted across bottom of sheet, in red: Topps of England Ltd. (London) Topps of Hong Kong Ltd. (Hong Kong)/ Topps of Canada Inc. (Montreal) Topps of Hong Kong Ltd. (Japan)
description: Dangling like an pocket watch from the top edge of the sheet is the circular company logo: the name "TOPPS" within triangular space defined by  ruled horizontal lines within circle border.  The logo's "thread" interrupts the company name  "TOPPS" - vertical line - PRODUCTS CORP. imprinted across top of sheet in red.  To left of logo, in red: "Topps Building". To right of logo (beneath company name) is company slogan: the world's largest watch band distributers, above company address.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, Topps Products Corp., late 20th century. Letterpress: dark gray, red ink on white wove paper. 
Gift of Thomas F. O'Malley. 1999-59-20
